SA15bsa069_u:17: abhinnaṃ cedvacanamapi nāstīti mama vacanamanyāyyamiti bhavatā kathamucyate /
SA15bsa069_u:19: tato vacanaṃ nyāyyamiti mama vacanamanyāyyamiti kathaṃ bhavatocyate /
SA15bsa069_u:23: yathā gośṛṅge 'śvakarṇau vā parasparaṃ khaṇḍayituṃ na śaknuvataḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:34: tato 'smadvacanaṃ bhavataśca khaṇḍanamityetayoretat khaṇḍanametacca khaṇḍanīyamiti viśeṣo na syāt /
SA15bsa069_u:50: yato yadi kumārī putravatīti na sampadyate /
SA15bsa069_u:59: yathā kaścinmanyeta śrotravijñānataḥ śabdasyānupalabdhiratha śrotravijñānataḥ śabdasyopalabdhiḥ pratyakṣasidveti,
SA15bsa069_u:92: iha loke yadā phalaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tadā sahetukaṃ jñātam /
SA15bsa069_u:97: yad bhavatoktaṃ mama vacanamanyahisaṃvāditvāditi tadidamidānīṃ bhavatā sārdhaṃ vicārya nirdhāryate /
SA15bsa069_u:103: yadi bhavadartho 'smaduktādanyastadānyatvadoṣo bhavata eva na tu mama /
SA15bsa069_u:119: yadyāvayorbheda eva na syānna tadā bhavatā vivādo 'haṃ tu bhavadarthameva vadāmi /
SA15bsa069_u:121: bhavatāpi kiñciduktamiti bhavānapyanyadvadatīti doṣo bhavata eva /
SA15bsa069_u:123: tarhi mamāpi vacanaṃ nānyaditi yad bhavatoktamahamanyadvadāmīti tadayuktam /
SA15bsa069_u:151: yadi bhavatocyate mama khaṇḍanamananubhāṣaṇameva tadā na mama matasyopalabdhi /
SA15bsa069_u:153: tato mama khaṇḍanaṃ kartuṃ na śakyate /
SA15bsa069_u:157: tadā bhavān khaṇḍanaṃ vaktuṃ na śaknoti /
SA15bsa069_u:158: kiṃ punarmanyate bhavān khaṇḍanamananubhāṣya khaṇḍanaṃ śakyaṃ,
SA15bsa069_u:167: na ca sa kālo vidyate yatra na khaṇḍanānubhāṣaṇam /
SA15bsa069_u:168: [ataḥ] yatra khaṇḍanaṃ vaktuṃ śakyate sa kālo nāsti /
SA15bsa069_u:171: ananubhāṣya tu khaṇḍanamiti vaktuṃ ja śakyate /
SA15bsa069_u:177: ananubhāṣya khaṇḍanaṃ nāma vaktuṃ śakyamiti ced,
SA15bsa069_u:178: ananubhāṣyāpi tataḥ prathamaṃ khaṇḍanaṃ nāma vaktuṃ śakyam /
SA15bsa069_u:179: prathamaṃ khaṇḍanam nāmānanubhāṣya khaṇḍanaṃ nāma vaktuṃ śakyamiti cet,
SA15bsa069_u:180: dvitīyamapi khaṇḍanaṃ nāmānanubhāṣya khaṇḍanaṃ nāma vaktuṃ śakyate /
SA15bsa069_u:181: dvitīyaṃ khaṇḍanaṃ nāmānanubhāṣya khaṇḍanamiti vaktuṃ śakyata iti cet,
SA15bsa069_u:187: tadā khaṇḍanaṃ nāma vaktuaṃ śakyate natvananubhāṣya vaktavyam /
SA15bsa069_u:197: yadā tvahaṃ bhavanmataṃ khaṇḍayāmi tadā bhavānapyanubhāṣate /
SA15bsa069_u:203: aparañca / sarve śabdā yadā mukhānnirgatāstadā naṣṭā eveti kathaṃ madvacanānubhāṣaṇam? /
SA15bsa069_u:210: tvadanubhāṣaṇāyaitanme vacanamiti yadbhavān bravīti sa kutarka eva /
SA15bsa069_u:221: kiñca yadyucyate bhavatā sarvāṇi vacanāni pūrvavartīni khaṇḍanantu paravartīti,
SA15bsa069_u:222: tadā bhavānapi pūrvameva vacanaṃ vadatīti paścātkhaṇḍanaṃ bhavet /
SA15bsa069_u:226: yacca khaṇḍanaṃ pūrvasya paravartīti svabhāvataḥ pūrvasya khaṇḍanaṃ na paścādasti /
SA15bsa069_u:227: yadi svabhāvata eva pūrvasya khaṇḍanaṃ paścāt syāt,
SA15bsa069_u:230: yadi svabhāvataḥ pūrvasya khaṇḍanaṃ na paścāt /
SA15bsa069_u:232: tadā pūrvasyāpi khaṇḍanaṃ parabhāvi na bhavet /
SA15bsa069_u:242: yadi hetvantarapratiṣṭhāpanādbhavato na nigrahasthānatvāpattistadā mamāpi tathā /
SA15bsa069_u:251: api ca yadi sarvāṇi vacanāni hetvantarāṇi syustadābhavaduktāni vacanānyapi hetvantarāṇi bhaveyuḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:253: atha vacanānyuccārayannapi na bhavān nigrāhyastarhi yadbhavatoktaṃ hetuṃ pratiṣṭhāpayannahaṃ nigrāhya iti tadayuktam /
SA15bsa069_u:259: yadi matamasmadartho bhavadarthādananyastadāsmadartho bhavadarthapratipakṣatayā na virudvo /
SA15bsa069_u:267: aparañca yaduktaṃ sarvaṃ tadarthāntarañcettadā bhavaduktamapyarthāntaraṃ bhavet /
SA15bsa069_u:268: yadi bhavaduktamarthāntaraṃ na bhavettadā yadbhavatā pratijñātaṃ sarvamarthāntaramiti tadayuktam /
SA15bsa069_u:285: anyacca / yathā mayā pūrvamuktamanityaḥ śabda iti /
SA15bsa069_u:288: tataśca yadbhavatoktaṃ bhavān pūrvavacanaṃ vadatīti tanmithyā /
SA15bsa069_u:295: ktaṃ mayā sarvamuktaṃ nānujñāyata iti tadidānīṃ (bhavatā sārdhaṃ)
SA15bsa069_u:297: sarvaṃ nānujñāyata iti yaduktaṃ bhavatā etadvacanaṃ sarvasminnantarbhavati na vā? /
SA15bsa069_u:298: yadi tāvatsarvasminnantarbhavati tadā bhavān svayaṃ svoktaṃ nānujānāti /
SA15bsa069_u:299: yadi svayaṃ nānujānātyasmadarthaḥ svata eva siddho bhavedbhavavacanasya tu hāniḥ syāt /
SA15bsa069_u:300: atha sarvasminnāntarbhavati tadā tasya sarvatvameva na syāt /
SA15bsa069_u:313: yadi pratiṣṭhāpitaṃ khaṇḍanaṃ samyagarthena na saṃyuktaṃ syāttadā tadviparītakhaṇḍanamityucyate /
SA15bsa069_u:330: śabdo 'pi tatheti śabdo 'nitya iti sthāpite prativādī prāha /
SA15bsa069_u:336: yannityaṃ na tatprayatnenotpannaṃ yathākāśaṃ nityaṃ na prayatnenotpannam /
SA15bsa069_u:352_0: prativādī tvanaikāntikaikarasārthapratyavasthānena khaṇḍanaṃ bhāṣate yathā yadi bhavān
SA15bsa069_u:352_1: sādharmyeṇa śabdasyānityatāṃ sthāpayati tadāhamapi vaidharmyeṇa śabdasya nityatāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmi /
SA15bsa069_u:353: yadi ca bhavadarthaḥ siddho mamāpyarthaḥ siddho bhavediti /
SA15bsa069_u:362: yadi bhavatā pratiṣṭhāpito heturasmaddhetutulyobhavettadā samyakkhaṇḍanaṃ sidhyeta /
SA15bsa069_u:366: tadānityatāviparyāsadoṣo vyaktīkartuṃ na śakyata iti prasiddham /
SA15bsa069_u:399: yo 'smābhiḥ sthāpito hetuḥ kṛtakatvācchabdo 'nitya iti tasya (hetoḥ)
SA15bsa069_u:402: yaḥ punarbhavatpratiṣṭhāpito hetuḥ śabdo nityo 'mūrtatvāditi tasya pakṣadharmaḥ sapakṣe vipakṣe ca vartata ityasiddho hetuḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:429: bhavaddhetuḥ sapakṣe vipakṣe ca vartate tasmādasādhakaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:433: yadatulyaṃ tulyamiti bhavatoktaṃ tasmādbhavataḥ khaṇḍanaṃ viparītam /
SA15bsa069_u:440: prativādī prāha yadi sādharmyādyathā ghaṭādyanityaṃ śabdo 'pi tathā syāttadā sarvasya sarveṇāviśeṣaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:445: sadharmāṇyapi sarvāṇi vastūni viśeṣṭavastubhyo bhinnānīti cecchabdo 'pi tathā /
SA15bsa069_u:452: sarveṣāṃ na mayā sattvādisādharmyaṃ pratiṣidvamapi tu teṣāṃ viśeṣa evāvadhāryate /
SA15bsa069_u:454: taccāsmābhiranityatāsādhanāyocyate na tu sādharmyamātramupādīyate na khalvasti sā kāpi yuktiryā naivaṃ vicāryate /
SA15bsa069_u:456: naikamapi vidyate tādṛśaṃ yadanyavastuno na sadṛśaṃ na ca viśiṣṭaṃ syāt /
SA15bsa069_u:479: yadi siddhā pratijñopādīyate 'siddhastu heturbhavataḥ khaṇḍanasya viparyāso 'dhikataro bhavet /
SA15bsa069_u:480: sarveṣāṃ vastūnāṃ pūrvamabhūtvā paścādabhāva iti mayoktam /
SA15bsa069_u:483: yadi pūrvaṃ śabdaḥ sanneva na cāsti pratibandhastadā kasmācchrotreṇa nopalabhyate /
SA15bsa069_u:486: iṣṭasādhanaṃ ca na yuktisampannaṃ so 'rtho nirasanīyaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:490: atha hetuḥ sādhyaṃ na prāpnoti tadāpyasādhakaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:493: yadi hetuḥ sādhyaṃ prāpnoti tadā sādhyena saṃsargātsādhyaṃ na sādhayati /
SA15bsa069_u:507: yadi bhavataḥ khaṇḍanamutpattihetusamāśritaṃ tadā siddhaṃ khaṇḍanam /
SA15bsa069_u:510: uktaṃ mayā yaddhetuḥ sādhyaṃ notpādayatyapi tu parapratipādanārthaṃ sādhyaṃ vyanaktyavyāvṛttatvāt /
SA15bsa069_u:515: yathā rūpasattve 'pi pradīpaprayojanaṃ tadvyañjanārthaṃ na tu tadutpattyartham /
SA15bsa069_u:521: yadi tāvaddhetuḥ prāk sādhyañca paścāttadāsati sādhye,
SA15bsa069_u:527: yathā yugapatsadbhāvāṅgoḥ śṛṅge dakṣiṇaṃ vāmaṃ vā parasparotpādake ityayuktam /
SA15bsa069_u:532: tadeva hetunā vyajyate yathā dīpaḥ vidyamānānyeva vastūni vyanakti na tvavidyamānāni vastūnyutpādayati /
SA15bsa069_u:533: bhavān punarutpattihetunā me vyañjakahetuṃ khaṇḍayati tasmādviparītametatkhaṇḍanaṃ,
SA15bsa069_u:535: atha manyase yadyeṣa heturvyañjakaheturbhavati jñānābhāve sa kasya hetuḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:537: tadā prāptikriyāsambhave heturnāma nopapadyate kriyāsadbhāve tu heturnāmopapadyate /
SA15bsa069_u:539: taduktaṃ bhavati pūrvaṃ heturnāma nopapadyate paścāttu heturnāmopapadyate /
SA15bsa069_u:540: yaccābhihitaṃ hetuḥ prāk kriyā tu paścāditi tadadoṣam /
SA15bsa069_u:552: yadi prayatna[ānantarīyaka]tvācchabdo 'nityastadā yatra prayatno na vidyate tatra nityatāprasaṅgaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:553: yathā vidyudvāyvādīnyaprayatna [ānantarīyaka]āṇyanityeṣu cāntarbhūtāni tasmādanityatve sādhye na prayatnamātraṃ samāśrayaṇīyaṃ prayatnasyāsādhanatvāt /
SA15bsa069_u:554: sādhanañcedyatra yatra prayatno nāsti tatra tatra nityatāyāḥ sambhavaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:564: yathā kasyacitpratijñā syāt sarve taravo divyacetanā iti /
SA15bsa069_u:570: śirīṣa eva svapiti na tvapare taravaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:571: sa svapno na sarvāṃstarūn vyāpnoti tasmātsarveṣāṃ tarūṇāṃ divyacetanatvapratiṣṭhāpane svapno 'samarthaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:575: naitaducyate mayā yatprayatnaḥ sarvānityatākhyāpane samartho heturanye tu hetavo 'samarthāḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:588: yadyahaṃ bravīmi yadyadanityaṃ tattatsarvaṃ prayatnasamutpannamiti tadā prayatnotpattihetoravyāpitvādasiddhatvamiti bhavatā khaṇḍanaṃ vaktavyam /
SA15bsa069_u:598: yatsamutpannaṃ tatprayatena vyaktaṃ yathā mūlakīlakodakaṃ prayatnena vyaktaṃ na tu prayatnena samutpannam /
SA15bsa069_u:603: kiṃ ghatavadasamutpannaḥ samutpadyate mūlakīlodakavatsamutpanno vā vyajyate?
SA15bsa069_u:611: api tu yataḥ prayatnena samutpannastasmācchabdo 'nitya iti /
SA15bsa069_u:631: yadi bhavato ghaṭadhvaṃsasya dhvaṃse sadbhāvastataḥ sadbhāvāddhvaṃsābhāvaḥ syāt /
SA15bsa069_u:650: yatprayatnenopalabhyate yacca prayatnena kriyate tadubhayaṃ bhinnamiti bhavatā pratiṣṭhāpitam /
SA15bsa069_u:656: yaccocyate yadabhivyaktaṃ nityamiti tasya kiṃ prayojanam /
SA15bsa069_u:661: prayatna iti vacanaṃ śabdasyānityatāheturiti cettadā kiṃ prāpyate? (Tś 23)
SA15bsa069_u:667: asmābhiḥ sthāpito heturabhivyaktyartho notpattyartho na vā vināśārthaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:671: yadi vināśahetunā mām khaṇḍayati bhavān tadviparītakhaṇḍanaṃ syāt /
SA15bsa069_u:672: 10. kāryabhedakhaṇḍanam- kāryyabhedād ghaṭavatacchabda iti na vaktavyam /
SA15bsa069_u:674: anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvād ghaṭavaditi sthāpite prativādī prāha ghaṭaśabdayoḥ kāryabhedaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:679: api tu sarvāṇi vastūni tulyena nyāyena kṛtakatvād anityānītyevamuktam /
SA15bsa069_u:732: ghaṭasya nityatā sthāpitā śabdo 'pi nityetāhetumantareṇa nityo bhavet /
SA15bsa069_u:755: meghe satyapi tu kadācidṛṣṭirbhavati kadācinna bhavatītyanaikāntikatā /
SA15bsa069_u:758: dhūme dṛṣṭe satyagniranumīyate dhūme tvasati agnerabhāvaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:782: asādharmyaṃ yacchabdaḥ śravaṇagrāhyo 'mūrtaśca ghaṭastu cakṣurgrāhyo mūrtaśca /
SA15bsa069_u:795: (Tś 27) yadi sato nityavaṃ siddhastadā dṛṣṭāntaḥ sada khaṇḍanam /
SA15bsa069_u:810: vastu sahetukañcet tadānityamiti jñeyaṃ ghaṭādivaditi sthāpite /
SA15bsa069_u:831: yadi gavādisāmānyaṃ gavādivyatiriktaṃ syāttadā pṛthaktvena grāhyaṃ draṣṭavyañca (Tś 28)
SA15bsa069_u:832: sāmānyantu gavādivyatiriktaṃ pṛthaktvena gṛhyate na ca dṛśyate /
SA15bsa069_u:868: kṛṣṇo bandhyāputraḥ śveta iti tadapi siddham bhavet /
SA15bsa069_u:883: etatritayamaprayatna[ānantarīya] kaṃ bhavatā tvekena prakāreṇa nityamiti manyate /
SA15bsa069_u:895: yadi kaścidvadedandhakāre prabhāstīti tadvacanamapi siddhaṃ bhavet /
SA15bsa069_u:898: anityateti pṛthagdharmo 'nityena na sambaddhaḥ yo nityo mantavyaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:900: yadyanutpannaṃ vastūtpattiṃ labhata utpannantu vinaśyati tato 'nityamityucyate /
SA15bsa069_u:915: yadi hetuḥ pūrvaṃ pratijñā tu paścāt,
SA15bsa069_u:919: yadi bhavatkhaṇḍanaṃ pūrvamasmatpratijñā tu paścādasmadarthābhāve kiṃ bhavatā khaṇḍyate /
SA15bsa069_u:920: yadyasmatpratijñā pūrvaṃ bhavatkhaṇḍanaṃ tu paścāttadāsmatpratijñāyāṃ sthāpitāyāṃ kiṃ bhavatkhaṇḍanena /
SA15bsa069_u:923: mayā prakaṭitaṃ yadbhavatkhaṇḍanaṃ bhavadarthameva pratiṣedhati na tu bhavatkhaṇḍanamavalambyāsmadartho pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:941: dvitīyo mūrdhā rūpagandhādimūrdhākārato na pṛthak mantavyaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:949: sa tu sanniti tadā dvitīyo mūrdhaviśeṣyo 'pi sanneva bhavet /
SA15bsa069_u:950: dvitīyo mūrdhā sanniti bhavatā cenna pratipādyate tadātmanyapi tathā pratipattavyam /
SA15bsa069_u:954: tadāhamapi nyāyāsamaśrayātsanneva dvitīyo mūrdhā na tvātmeti cedvadeyameṣo 'rthaḥ sidvo bhavet /
SA15bsa069_u:955: athāsmadartho na siddho bhavadartho 'pi na sidva ityucyate prasaṅgavyaktiḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:956: anyacca / ātmā dvitīya iva mūrdhāviśeṣyaḥ na tvasanniti cettadā vaiṣamyadoṣo bhavanmūrdhyāpatet /
SA15bsa069_u:957: yadi kaścidvadedvandhyāputraḥ sālaṅkāro bandhyāputro niralaṅkāra iti tadapi siddhaṃ bhavet /
SA15bsa069_u:962: nyāyāsamāśrayānniyatameva nāsti dvitīyo mūrdheti siddhaṃ ca tadvacanamiti tadā (Tś 32)
SA15bsa069_u:965: grāhyoḥ vāyurityādi mūrkhavacanāninyāyāsamāśritānyapi bhavatsādhyavat siddhāni bhaveyuḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:1003: śabda ākāśasādharmyannitya iti cettato yadi vaidharmyaṃ syāt,
SA15bsa069_u:1008: sādharmyaṃ vaidharmyaṃ vā na mayā samālocyate /
SA15bsa069_u:1016: vaidharmyaṃ tu sarvamanityaṃ nityavyatiriktamiti niścitaṃ vyanakti /
SA15bsa069_u:1027: asparśatvahetunā nityaḥ śabda iti bhavatā sthāpitam /
SA15bsa069_u:1033: yadi heturasiddhastadā pratijñāpyasiddheti prasiddhamiti pratyavasthita idamāha /
SA15bsa069_u:1034: śabdo nityatā ceti na mama pratijñā /
SA15bsa069_u:1037: yo mayā nirdiṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ sa rūpādiniṣedhārthaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:1041: śabdo nityatāyā na vyatiricyate śrotragrāhyādikāttu vyatiricyate /
SA15bsa069_u:1045: mayā na śabdo na ca nityatā sthāpyate /
SA15bsa069_u:1056: iti sthāpite 'paraḥ prāha bhavatoktaṃ sarvamanityaṃ tasmānnityaḥ śabda iti /
SA15bsa069_u:1074: iti sthāpite 'paraḥ prāha nityaḥ śabda aindriyakatvāditi bhavatoktam /
SA15bsa069_u:1079: tathā hi gavādisāmānyaṃ gavāderabhinnaṃ bhinnaṃ vā /
SA15bsa069_u:1083: gorvyatiriktaṃ sāmānyaṃ prakāśeta na tu gorvyatiriktaṃ sāmānyaṃ prakāśate tasmāddṛṣṭānto na nityatāsādhakaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:1085: (Tś 36) iti dūṣaṇe kṛte prativādī prāha kenaitatsthāpitam /
SA15bsa069_u:1098: yathā vāyoḥ sparśasya ca sakṛdevābhivaktavāpi vāyuranityaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:1105: pūrvamuktaṃ bhavatā śabdo nityo dviranabhivyaktatvādityadhunā tūcyate śabdo vāyuvilakṣaṇaḥ pṛthagindriyagrāhyatvāditi prathamahetutyāgena bhavata hetvantaraṃ pratiṣṭhāpitam /
SA15bsa069_u:1119: yadi kaściddharmaṃ vakti pariṣattu prativādī ca jijñāsāvapi trirabhihitaṃ jñātumasamarthau /
SA15bsa069_u:1121: aṇuramūrtaḥ sukhotpādakaḥ duḥkhotpādako 'prāpto sāpakarṣotkarṣaḥ samito 'sannyāso na vināśaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:1128: daśavidhaṃ phalaṃ trividhaḥ kaṃbala ekavidhaṃ pānabhojanametadapārthakamucyate /
SA15bsa069_u:1132: yathā pārimāṇḍalyāśrayasya paramāṇornityatvātpārimāṇḍalyaṃ nityaṃ śabdasyāpi tathātvasambhava iti kṛte 'paraḥ prāha /
SA15bsa069_u:1138: atrāparaḥ / yathā gṛhe dagdhe tatparitrāṇāyodakānveṣaṇaṃ tathānavasare 'rtharakṣaṇāya hetusthāpanam /
SA15bsa069_u:1140: 11. nyūnam / pañcāvayavā anyatamena hīnā iti nyūnam /
SA15bsa069_u:1146: yadvastu kṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ kṛtako 'nityaśceti tṛtīyo 'vayavaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:1159: atha sādhanasamarthastadā kiṃ hetubāhulyena udāharaṇabahulye 'pi tathātvasambhavaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:1171: satyaṃ saṃsāro duḥkhaṃ satyaṃ nirvāṇaṃ sukham /
SA15bsa069_u:1177: yadi na kiñcit prakaṭayitavyaṃ tadā tadaprayojanam /
SA15bsa069_u:1182: 15. ajñānam / pariṣadā vijñātāyā api pratijñāyāḥ kenacidavijñānamajñānamucyate /
SA15bsa069_u:1183: 16. apratibhā / yadi parasya pratijñāṃ nyāyavadīkṣate dūṣaṇe cāsamarthastadāpratibhā /
SA15bsa069_u:1187: yadi kaścidarthaṃ na vijānāti dūṣaṇe cāsamarthastena saha vādo na kartavya iti /
SA15bsa069_u:1194: 17. vikṣepaḥ / svapratijñāyā doṣaṃ jñātvā vyājaiḥ parihāraḥ kāryāntarakathanam /
SA15bsa069_u:1197: tadā tu yadi nāpakrāmati paradūṣaṇanirākaraṇaṃ na kalpayati /
SA15bsa069_u:1210: tadarthe ca hīne kiṃ prayojanaṃ dūṣaṇena /
SA15bsa069_u:1219: pūrvaṃ caturvidhe siddhānte svayamaṅgīkṛte 'pi paścāccedyathāsiddhāntaṃ na brūyādayamapasiddhāntaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:1231: yaḥ saśṛṅga sa gaurityanaikāntikaḥ chāgarurvādīnāṃ saśṛṅgatvāt /
SA15bsa069_u:1239: yadi kenacideṣa hetuḥ prayujyate tadā hetvābhāsanigrahasthānāpattiḥ /
